DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study aim produce preliminary data safety provide high-protein meal patient dialysis , effect intervention nutritional status quality life outcomes . This non-randomized , parallel arm study . Meals provide follow recommended dietary guideline HD patient provide approximately 1/3 daily recommend protein intake . Patients allocate either treatment control group HD shift schedule . 2 month baseline data collect , follow 9 week meal intervention/control data collection . The primary outcome frequency hypotensive event dialysis require intervention . Secondary outcome include high low systolic blood pressure dialysis , blood biochemistry include measure renal function , nutritional status , electrolyte balance ; dialysis compliance ; fluid retention ; sleep quality life measure ; dietary intake data .
